data.title: Garment District NYC — For The Sherry’s Shopping Extraordinaire
data.meta_description: The Garment District NYC plays home to New York’s renowned fashion facilities, warehouses and showrooms, making this a must-visit neighborhood for The Sherry-Netherland shopping enthusiast.
data.text:
NYC's Fashion District

Some would call this the fashion capital of the United States, where the nation’s densest concentration of design talent flourishes in this New York neighborhood. Find amazing sales on designer apparel in the Garment District thanks to the neighborhood’s sample sales or view the various public art installations on the Garment District Plazas.

Garment District Tours & Sample Sales

Fashion enthusiasts can embark on a free Garment District walking tour for an insider look at this fashion capital. From the advent of the sewing machine to the introduction of synthetic fibers, a licensed tour guide provides an inside look for style connoisseurs. Or visit designer showrooms and shop by appointment only when you choose Garment District tour guides. Purchase high-end fashions at a fraction of the price (sometimes 80% off retail price) and get the insider's scoop on the latest New York sample sales. May, June, November, and December are some of the best times for samples sales in New York.

For those who like to explore on their own, the Garment District’s Places Directory offers a searchable resource, featuring the district’s entire database of fashion-industry tenants. If you’re an art lover, be certain to check out any number of public art installations featured in the Garment District.
